DetectEnglish - Class in cipher
A class that contains most of the methods to do with the detection of English in decrypted text and the subsequent respacing.

detectPeriodic(String) - Method in class cipher.Manager
Detects whether a given piece of text is encoded with a periodic cipher, by identifying peaks in the indices of coincidence.
detectSubstitution(String) - Method in class cipher.Manager
Detects whether a given piece of text has been encoded with a substitution cipher by calculating the Bhattacharya coefficient of the letter distribution of the text and normal English.
